introduction: In her thirties, Jeanne lost her father in a stupid accident. A few years later, her mother starts a relationship with a man who bears a striking resemblance to the deceased. He's not a ghost, just a bad double, and Jeanne's mother has decided to reenact their story, according to her own rules. But if it means bringing back the dead, Jeanne thinks she should have her say, especially about what she was unable to express when her father was alive.
